pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Promotion Time Cure Model with Bayesian Shrinkage Priors // Generalized promotion time cure model (GPTCM) via Bayesian hierarchical modeling for multiscale data integration (Zhao et al. (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2509.01001). The Bayesian GPTCMs are applicable for both low- and high- dimensional data.
